entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "error: out of range pc-relative fixup value" on linux-armel checked CoreCLR_NonPortable #100047
  • build.cmd fails to pick the right MSVC toolset on `1es-windows-2022-open` #100046
  • I need to modify the value of string type if the property name is "xyz" in JsonConverter<string> using System.Text.Json #100045
  • Incorrect FrameworkTarget dll is used in transitive multi-targeted ProjectReference + DisableTransitiveProjectReferences is used #100044
  • Socket.Bind does not work with any UDP port on Mac OSX #100043
  • Subset Help No Longer Works In Main Build Script #100042
    9.0.0
  • Memory leaking when calling ECDsa.Create(ECParameters) on Linux container #100037
  • Assert failure(PID 13812 [0x000035f4], Thread: 14128 [0x3730]): promoted_bytes (heap_number) == promoted #100035
  • C++/CLI x86 marshalling misses copy ctor/dtor calls resulting in C++ STL iterator debugging breaking #100033
  • System.Reflection.Emit can't call a generic method having a function pointer parameter #100020
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.Http.PipeReaderContent #100019
  • [mono] Implement UnmanagedCallersOnly support for Swift calling convention #100010
    9.0.0
  • C# compiler generates highly suboptimal code for compound assignments with struct ref variables #100008
  • Linux System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: does the library support multiple server connection? #100007
  • [Question] Is it possible that .NET 7 framework-dependent application requires specific (the latest) .NET runtime version? #100006
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to select QUIC congestion control algorithm #100003
  • System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Messages.dll doesn't have fileversion and other resources #99997
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonElement.ValueEquals(JsonElement) #99994
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow `CborReader` to read from a stream #99993
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generation fails to compile when explicit property names and ignored property names collide. #99988
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Tracking issue for CI build timeouts #76454
    9.0.0
  • Failing test `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.CancelStopAsync` #94268
    9.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException due to use of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BinaryOperatorKind.Error enum #90331
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Tests.DefaultValueAttributeTests.Ctor_TypeDescriptorNotFound_ExceptionFallback - Exit code was -1073740791 but it should have been 42 #93372
    9.0.0
  • Building helloworld for .NET Core Android #13155
  • JsonNode.ToJsonString can throw when JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver is null #99971
  • Assert failure: pMethodDesc != NULL in tieredcompilation.cpp, when using `RequestReJITWithInliners` profiler API #100024
  • SocketException (10054) while trying to post byte array to a HTTPS server in dotnet 6 with HTTPClient #99724
  • [tvos][arm64][mono] Attempting USB tunnel between the port 56494 on the device and the port 56494 (44764) on the mac: 61 #99649
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) started popping a lot since upgrading to .NET 7 #91571
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Extra flags on tree"' #99929
    9.0.0
  • net 8 console app making use of Microsoft.Extensions.* NuGet Package won't deploy without aspnet runtime #100009
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/ArrayLengthArithmetic/ArrayLengthArithmetic.dll #99884
    9.0.0
  • Rust built WASM library in Blazor project fails on wasm-opt when being published #96394
  • [Tracking] Implement Mono support for Swift calling convention #94081
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] CryptographicException : An unknown chain building error occurred - Failing in test System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #99425
    9.0.0
  • No TypeDefinitionDocuments entries compiled for enums/interfaces etc in pdb #99969
  • [API proposal]: System.CommandLine APIs #68578
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] invocation of user JS in UI thread till next event loop tick #100040
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Test 1es-windows-2022-open Windows build #100038
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix pathing issue for corerun copying in Mono runs #100036
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't log error from background service if host is gracefully stopped while still starting #100032
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #100031
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [browser] further improve HTTP cancelation #100029
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Mark BigMul as AggressiveInlining #100027
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to interpret m2n wrapper if it is not found in aot image #100025
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NOREVIEW] Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove copy_version_files.sh #100022
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Move Interlocked null checks to managed, RhpLockCmpXchg64 to C #100021
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add basic support for Swift reverse pinvokes #100018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix filtering compressed assets for pdb during publish #100016
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing #100004
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip ro segments which are not in range when walking heap for GC diagnostics #100002
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Trim unused interfaces #100000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • LogicalName added for EmbeddedResource #99999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix regression from test merging #99996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move various thread-local objects that were used in self-contained places out of Thread #99989
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Move SVE helpers to emitarm64sve.cpp #100034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove hasLikelihood checks; make FlowEdge::m_likelihoodSet debug-only #99925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete src/installer/tests/scripts/linux-test #99848
    area-Host
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Fix flags updating when sinking stores below commas #100005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete some unused fields in `CallArgABIInformation` #99972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Move SVE-specific emitIns logic to emitarm64sve.cpp #99983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix detection of exceptionally called funclet in stack walk #99958
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add back NoWarn #99995
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix a mistake in genInstrWithConstant #99948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Fix failing CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test (#99915) #99950
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99473
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.30
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99474
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99475
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.5
  • Use templated encoding helpers for signed and unsigned immediates #99815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove duplicative sorting when enumerating OrderBy.Take/Skip #99973
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize mono_metadata_decode_row_col_raw #99939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Delete TestProjectFixture and associated helpers #99847
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx10
  • JIT: Update IL offsets in `fgExpandStaticInitForCall` #99662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Defer parsing of wasm stack symbolication maps #99974
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change the CryptoKit interop entrypoints to use the Swift calling convention #99970
    area-System.Security
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #99664
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99678
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99781
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Clean up some call multi-reg ret handling #99679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Update runtime docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #99665
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #99666
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Obsolete invalid AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate* overloads #99985
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Review UnsafeRawPointer projections in C# for CryptoKit dev templates #2529

PullRequests

    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet nuget sign error: Unknown error (0xc100000d) #39640
  • Dotnet format in .NET 8 can yield code that does not compile #39637
  • Auto-referenced packages gets added to packages.lock.json for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly #39635
  • False positives from PackageValidationBaselineVersion when changing target (enum values and nullable properties) #39629
  • .NET Core 8 taking a lot longer to build and publish #39628

PullRequests

Created

  • Update EOL versions #39645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • dotnet watch refactoring #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Use built-in SourceRevisionId instead of git rev-parse HEAD #39613
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2409193 #39615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic Search: Consider adding support for in-proc query execution #72617
  • Call Hierarchy does not set focus to editor #72615
  • No TypeDefinitionDocuments entries compiled for enums/interfaces etc in pdb #72607

Closed

  • Compiler doesn't terminate on file with syntax errors #72557
    17.10
  • CompletionService.GetCompletionsAsync NullReferenceException #72389
  • Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #69628
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Log build host stack trace in exception handling #72624
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update EOL versions #72623
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break added documents into batches when processing solution/compilation translation states. #72621
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't classify regex/json in binary string addition #72620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Replay Binary Log Tool #72619
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2409580 #72618
    auto-merge
  • Recover from wrong collection expression target type in nullable walker #72616
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • [VB] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants, or whose embedded expressions are only string as optimized as `&` operator or C# (pre 10.0) #72611
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Pass the temp path to DesktopStrongNameProvider ctor #72587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable diagnostics when solution crawler option is disabled #72590
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Share compilation when generators don't produce any generated files #72602
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix event hookup even when in a projection buffer #72608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix excessive compilation times due to speculative parsing after an incomplete string #72565
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Drop win32-ia32 language server support #72605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove workaround for .net7 r2r assembly loading issue #72603
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix #69628 Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #72569
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disallow modifiers in local_using_declaration #72589
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Prefer pattern-based over interface-based disposal in await using #72598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix LspFileChangeWatcher case sensitivity #72555
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SolutionCompilationState.CreateCompilationTrackerMap #72596
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle InterceptsLocation with location specifier string #72553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible account enumeration in reset password #54653
  • Performance with many Blazor Assemblies #54652
  • Add support for OpenAPI document filters #54650
    9.0-preview4
  • Blazor: can't pass reference to element when hosted in shadow DOM #54648
  • Hybrid Cache API proposal #54647
    .NET 9 Planning
  • JSInvokableAttribute - No details on where the issue is. Undebuggable. #54646
  • Issue with Dot Net Core MVC #54645
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid fails with "BLAZOR106: The JS module file wwwroot/_content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid/QuickGrid.razor.js' was defined but no associated razor component or view was found for it." #54644
  • Auto-referenced packages gets added to packages.lock.json for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly #54643
  • SecurityTokenInvalidIssuerException: IDX10204: Unable to validate issuer. validationParameters.ValidIssuer is null or whitespace AND validationParameters.ValidIssuers is null or empty. #54640
  • DataProtectorTokenProvider does not implement TimeProvider #54639
  • Perf regression: caching #54638
  • Some APIs do not verify the TOKNE expiration date #54635
  • RFC 6238 Two-Factor Authentication service fails on .NET Framework 4.8 #54634
  • Questions around PersistentComponentState in Blazor #54633

Closed

  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback after upgrade to dotnet 8 #53131
    8.0.x
  • Blazor WASM MSAL Published Application Gets Stuck on "Completing Login" #52619
    9.0-preview3
  • Error when serializing InteractiveRequestOptionsSerializerContext #52291
    .NET 9 Planning
  • .NET 8 preview7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication ends with There was an error trying to log you in: '"undefined" is not valid JSON' #49956
    8.0.x
  • Reload the browser when the circuit ID is unknown #9256
    Backlog
  • PasswordValidator shall support "RequiredCharTypes" #49896
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: mvc #54624
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #54637
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #54625
  • dotnet new webapi template : package reference Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version isn't the last one #52246
    Backlog
  • [NETSDKE2E]warning CS8618: Non-nullable property 'Http' must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor when building blazorWasm project. #54603

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to 1ES templates #54651
    area-infrastructure
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during JS interop #54225
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Simplify Publishing.props #54566
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [release/2.1] Convert to 1es pipelines #54628
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Pass -nativeToolsOnMachine #54622
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Update branding to preview4 #54630
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Limit parallelism of forced key ring refreshes #54627
    area-dataprotection
  • fix: remove double logging of BadHttpRequest errors #54395
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #54492
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Improve route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Java discovery in helix-matrix pipeline #54631
    area-infrastructure
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Timeout while executing StartEventPipeSession #4557
  • "No CLR runtime found" analyzing Linux .NET 6.0.26 crash dump #4555
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update EOL versions #4561

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView in MAUI project doesn't scroll when has a PDF file loaded #21346
  • Connect To Mac - Object reference not set to an instance of an object #21344
  • RestrictionManager not returning any values in MAUI android. #21342
    Backlog
  • [Android] Crash when replacing a Layout (Grid or Stacked) in an existing layout #21338
  • Allow Access To External drive Videos #21336
  • RadioButtonGroup.SelectedValue binding not works #21335
  • [8.0.10] Windows FontImageSourceService assumes MSIX packaging #21333
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [MacCatallyst-arm64] app file size is extremely large for custom configuration #21332
  • Unloaded event behaviour in CollectionView header control inconsistent between Android and iOS #21331
  • MAUI Swipe view items looks weird on iOS #21329
  • Link in Label with TextType HTML is not clickable #21328
  • [Android/iOS][NavigationPage] Inheritance of NavigationPage breaks TitleView #21327
  • `Span` does not inherit text styling from `Label` if that styling is applied using `Style` #21326
  • "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property, and doesn't display a preview in the XAML editor #21325
    Backlog
  • Unable to hit debug point in C# Library from Android MAUI .NET7 App #21323
  • Shell navigation with modal page does not show title view #21321

Closed

  • Memory raising when using flyout navigation #21147
  • iOS CollectionView items overlap when their content is resized #21337
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] Place the cursor in the middle of the editor and the cursor will always move to the end for D10 page #18241
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Android] CollectionVIew scrolling performance on MAUI lags compared to XF #18505
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Seemingly over-aggressive dependency caching when building iOS app #21302
  • [Windows] Controls.sample project crashes #21324
  • .net8 maui CollectionView.Header bug? #21179
  • XamlC XC0022 warning : Binding could be compiled if x:DataType is specified after upgrade to 8.0.7 #21288

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
  • [controls] improve perf of "merged" ResourceDictionary lookups #21334
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deletion can cause error "The association between entity types A and B has been severed..." #33365
  • Is EF Core dead like EF6 (classic) or why is there no plan for EF9 four months after the release of EF8? #33364
  • Explicitly selecting properties from JSON OwnedCollection crashes on OrderBy #33360
  • Materialization Interceptor - Change a property value #33359
  • NRE thrown from SplitQueryingEnumerable.Enumerator.Dispose() when there is a connection error #33357

Closed

  • was EntityTypeAttributeConventionBase removed in v. 8 ? #33345
  • `SaveChangesAsync` without creating a savepoint in a transaction #33358

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor OperationTaskBase to derive from ToolTask #33367
  • Enforce dot sourcing. #33363
  • Consistent and idiomatic casing/formatting. #33362
  • Green prompt "identifier" (similar to Python's venv). #33361

Merged

  • update branding to preview4 #33366

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
  • [release/6.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33303
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Update EOL OS versions #33355
    tell-mode

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • `dotnet restore` never completes #17481

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix indentation for log copy #19122
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #19121
  • Update-eol-versions-8.0 #19120
  • Update EOL versions #19119
  • Update MsftToSbSdk.diff baseline #19118
  • Use package source mappings in VMR build #19114
  • Skip Omnisharp.cs and WebScenarioTests.cs for PublishComplex action #19110

Merged

  • Update MsftToSbSdk.diff baseline #19117
  • Updates to Binary Tooling #19043
  • 1ES templates - small cleanup #19104
  • Remove the format repo which was merged into sdk #19113
  • Revert "[release/8.0.2xx] NGEN Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver.dll and its dependencies (#17750)" #19112

Updated

  • Remove cloaked binaries #18563
  • Move unified build sdk validation to a test project #19090
  • Migrate VMR-related pipelines to 1ES templates #19100
  • Stop syncing `main-ub` branch #18564
  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #18941
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Migrate VMR pipeline to 1ES templates #19073
  • Create and publish VerticalAssetManifest #19062
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19102
